bm_ability_yakuza_injector_desc:
30 Seconds cooldown -1s cooldown on kill

When activated, you gain 35% movement speed and 40% armor regeneration for 8 seconds, and when you use your melee weapon, you will receive self-damage if you miss (useful in stealth)
bm_ability_burglar_luck_desc:
30 Seconds cooldown -1s cooldown on kill

When activated, you gain 30% dodge for 8 seconds
